scenario: Bob received the following amounts during the year: Loan Proceeds: $19,186.39, Gift from Parents: $20,914.05, Interest on Bank Account: $31,109.34.
question: Calculate Bob's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $31,109.34.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items (Gifts, Loans, etc.).
